app.name: Shutdown
app.long_description:
This is probably the most pointless app ever made. Maybe more pointless than that IOSU reboot example. All it does is shut down your console. That's it.
This is dedicated to *that one person who can't seem to be screwed pressing the POWER button on his/her console/controller*.
Shutdown icon made by Dave Gandy from www.flaticon.com Graphics make use of the Overpass font by Delve Withrington
